channel.title: 🏢 DI ENS, CRNS, PSL University, INRIA Paris on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 DI ENS, CRNS, PSL University, INRIA Paris on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Aligning Embeddings and Geometric Random Graphs: Informational Results and Computational Approaches for the Procrustes-Wasserstein Problem
item.description: This paper presents novel informational results and a new algorithm (‘Ping-Pong’) for solving the Procrustes-Wasserstein problem, significantly advancing high-dimensional data alignment.
